titles.title: VALOR Act
Veterans' Access to Local Options for Recovery Act of 2007
To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand access to hospital care for veterans in urban areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
12/19/2007--Introduced.
Veterans' Access to Local Options for Recovery Act of 2007 (VALOR Act) - Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to seek to enter into a contract with a non-Department of Veterans Affairs facility located in an eligible metropolitan statistical area to provide hospital care and medical services to veterans.
